description: Mishima Yuuki is a student at Shuujin Academy. He was originally a member of the volleyball team, and was a frequent target of Kamoshida`s abuse. After Kamoshida`s fall, he becomes fascinated by the mysterious Phantom Thieves that brought it about, starting a web forum called the Phan-Site where he holds discussions and polls about the Phantom Thieves. He befriends Amamiya Ren, believing him rightly to be the leader of the Phantom Thieves.
name: Mishima Yuuki
